physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Faint pubic down on the mons pubis, Tanner II pubic hair development. No axillary hair. Normal neurological exam.
Tanner IV breasts and pubic hair. Mild periareolar and periumbilical hair.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Pubic hair has progressed to Tanner stage III–IV by age 9 yr.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Tanner IV breasts and pubic hair. Significant hirsutism with a Ferriman-Gallwey score of 16 and mild acne.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Weight percentile has stabilized; however, she continues to have irregular cycles and hyperinsulinemia.
